title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Plan A Field Trip
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Plan A Field Trip               Plan A Field Trip      There are three basic types of field trips to Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore. Self Guided trips    You coordinate the transportation, supervision, educational, and recreational opportunities.  Check out the Self Guided section where we have provided some samples and suggestions. Before you come, let us know so we can alert you to special concerns about the area you will be visiting. ...more  West Beach Educational fee waiver instructions  - During the summer months (Friday, Memorial Weekend - Monday, Labor Day), the West Beach area of the park is a Federal Fee Area. Groups visiting the area for educational purposes during this time may obtain a waiver of this fee if your group meets established criteria. NOTE: If your planned educational visit includes recreation at the lakefront, such as swimming, an educational fee waiver can not be granted.        Ranger Guided trips  You coordinate the transportation, supervision, and recreational opportunities. At times, we can provide educators for your group based on one of our developed programs that you select. However, for most of the year, staffing is very limited. ...more  West Beach Educational Fee Waiver - During the summer months (Friday, Memorial Weekend - Monday, Labor Day), the West Beach area of the park is a Federal Recreation Fee Area. Groups visiting the area for educational purposes during this time may obtain a waiver of this fee if your group meets established criteria. NOTE: If your planned educational visit includes recreation at the lakefront, such as swimming, an educational fee waiver can not be granted.           Residential/Overnight trip Residential experiences are available through our partner Indiana Dunes Environmental Learning Center that is located within the national lakeshore. ...more
